name: Catsparella "Every Day Is Caturday" Ladies Fit Tee
description: Live like every day is Caturday in this stylish tee by Catsparella! -Gildan Ladies-Fit Softstyle T-Shirt -Black shirt with white and hot pink screen printing (Refer to the third image for a more accurate depiction of the shade of hot pink) -Preshrunk 100% cotton jersey -Slightly adjusted feminine tapered fit with sideseamed construction Note: Shirts run SMALL. I typically wear a Large, but take an XL in this shirt (which I am pictured wearing). Please refer to the sizing chart below and consider ordering one size up. Sizing Chart: Exchange Policy: Unworn and unwashed shirts can be exchanged for a different size within 30 days of purchase. Buyer is responsible for return shipping, and the correct size will be shipped back to you at no additional charge. Please include your name, address, and requested shirt size with all returns. Care Instructions: Machine wash warm, inside out, with like colors. Only non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry medium. Do not iron. Do not dry clean. (7% sales tax will be added for NJ residents)

name: Catsparella "If you think I'm cute, you should see my cat" Tote
description: Show your kitty pride with this delightful "If you think I'm cute, you should see my cat" tote bag by Catsparella! Sturdy natural canvas bag with black and hot pink screen printing. Roomy interior with gusseted bottom that is spacious enough for every day use. Measurements: 15" W x 14" H x 4" D Material: 100% eGreen Cotton Canvas Due to limited stock, I cannot accept returns or exchanges at this time. (7% sales tax will be added for NJ residents)
